thread.section_title: Winhost Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Winhost | winhost.com
thread.title: Bud Jay

author: Bud Jay
title: Bud Jay
text: I joined Winhost to move a standalone server that has existed for 19 years, JCSM.com. In the process, I also have created Budjay.com. Both of these are Classic ASP sites accessing Access Databases. In themselves these are real challenges to find these days. In the transition, I had need of tech support multiple times, and the Winhost techies really shown. I am completely satisfied, and look forward to being here for 19 more years!
